basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: Technical Onboarding Manager | SaaS • Project Management • Client Success
basics.summary: Customer-focused SaaS professional with 5+ years of experience in onboarding, project management, and technical delivery. Skilled at guiding clients through the end-to-end onboarding process, aligning internal teams, and ensuring successful deployments. Strong technical foundation in web technologies (HTML, JavaScript, APIs, Docker) with a proven ability to bridge the gap between technical and non-technical stakeholders.

work.name: Hawkins Computer Services (Brightside SaaS Platform)
highlights: Led onboarding for all new SaaS clients, serving as the primary point of contact from contract through successful deployment
Conducted kickoff calls, gathered requirements, and aligned stakeholders to ensure clear expectations and success criteria
Collaborated with cross-functional teams (strategy, analytics, development) to deliver seamless onboarding experiences
Documented processes, authored technical guides, and provided end-user training to support adoption
Built and integrated solutions using REST, GraphQL, and custom APIs, ensuring smooth technical implementation
Co-led front-end migration from GWT to Vue.js, modernizing client-facing interfaces

work.name: AAM, USA
highlights: Co-designed and built a React/TypeScript point-of-sale platform for national distributors
Redesigned and rebuilt checkout/cart systems, improving usability and client satisfaction
Developed internal and client-facing tools using PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, and React within a custom MVC framework
Collaborated with 10-person development team using Agile workflows, GitHub, and Asana

work.name: Unbound Digital
highlights: Managed Help Desk team growth from 1 to 5 members while overseeing 100+ client accounts
Led complex client projects such as migrating entire organizations from on-premise servers to Microsoft 365, creating detailed plans and coordinating stakeholders to ensure seamless transitions
Developed onboarding workflows, KPIs, and documentation to improve support efficiency and customer satisfaction
Monitored and maintained 1,400+ devices across diverse business environments
Installed and configured client/server networks and cloud systems, ensuring smooth deployments
Communicated complex technical issues and project updates clearly to non-technical stakeholders

work.name: Premier Dental Lab
highlights: Implemented and trained staff on advanced CAD/CAM software and 3D printing systems
Maintained lab computer systems and supported end users in a technical environment

work.name: Gray Station Dental
highlights: Led 3-person team coordinating daily clinical operations and schedules
Managed equipment installs and documentation, exceeding compliance standards
